title: With the previous approval of the Commissioner to a layout prepared for development or redevelopment
clause_text: With the previous approval of the Commissioner to a layout prepared for development or redevelopment of the entire open land and/or built up area of the premises of a cotton textile mill which is either sick and/or closed or requiring modernization on the same land, the Commissioner may allow:--
